name: User story
about: This template defines a user story
title: ''
labels: new

---

**As a** [role]
**I need** [function]
**So that** [benefit]
### Details and Assumptions
    * [document what you know]
### Acceptance Criteria
    Given [some context]
    When [certain action is taken]
    Then [the outcome of action is observed]
